Telemetrix And Telemetrix-AIO Have Been Officially Released

Alan Yorinks
~1 min read November 9, 2020

Categories

  • arduino,telemetrix,stm32

Tags

  • arduino

Both Telemetrix and TelemetrixAIO have been officially released today. A user guide is available online.

So what is next? I will be working on a version of Telemetrix4Arduino (the Telemetrix Sketch) for the ESP-8266 so that it can be controlled over WiFi.

Stay tuned! Stay Safe!
